- Mini-game with throwing pieces of paper.
- Weather conditions.

- New mini-game: "Water bombs"
- New animal: Dog.
- Wallpaper (Menu - Enhancements - Wallpapers)
- "Practice" (PC - Work)
- Training for mini-games.
- New poster: "JiJa"
- New pillows: "Karami" and "Shana"
- Quick access to the figurines (in the cupboard)
- A couple of new events.

- Approach for garbage ejection.
- Animal feed (x16).
- Improved "Imageboard".
- Acceleration of training and food delivery.
- Music when knocking on the door.
- Icon nootropics.
- Selecting posters in the cabinet.
- A bunch of improvements and bug fixes.

- Mini-games and store are available through the menu.
- Garbage is limited to 150% + notification after eating.
- The player survives if you have not logged in for more than two weeks.
- Sleep without a pillow does not spend calm.
- Updated the engine, there should be problems with some devices.
- Bugfix.
Update 1.8 with new content will be in June.

- Levels of difficulty.
- Changing masks and chairs.
- New pillow: "02"
- New posters: "Summer", "Peka Gear".
- Coffee brings 50₽ instead of 25₽, faster acceleration delivery to 6 hours instead of 3.
- Freezing pass option.
- Now you can hide the animal.
- Time of changing the day and night on the clock.

- New mini-game - "Darts".
- New chandeliers.
- Changed pillow balance.
- Added 5 new events.
- Interaction with neighbors' door.
- Ability to change complexity once.
- Smooth opening of laptops.

- Now you need to feed the fish and animals, you also need to clean the aquarium.
- When using fish food, calm when using a computer does not spend 2 hours.
- Double effect of playing with animals.
- Ability to change the complexity of any number of times per donate.
- Fixed synchronization.

- Fixed synchronization.

- Ability to change the complexity of any number of times per donate.
- Fixed synchronization.
